alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 05 at 3:36PM AKDT until June 06 at 8:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM AKDT TUESDAY FOR EASTERN ALASKA RANGE... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM AKDT Tuesday. * AFFECTED AREA...From Ft Greely south to the Donnelly Dome area. * TIMING...From noon to 8 PM AKDT Tuesday. * WINDS...Southeast 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 23 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the low to lower to mid 70s. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires are possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
